title: Hydatids: a cycle to break
brief_description: Illustrates the life cycle of the cyst showing how it is transmitted to humans via dogs who have eaten infected sheep offal. Stresses that efficient disposal of infected sheep offal by farmers can go a long way to preventing the infection of dogs with cysts and that humans should exercise good hygiene habits when handling dogs.
